ContactLayout.description: Reach us via the contact form or by phone. We'll reply as quickly as possible.

meta.description: Get in touch with us for any inquiries or questions.
meta.title: Contact

ContactLayout.title: Get in touch

curfew.answer: There is no curfew in any house; please keep noise low in the early mornings and late evenings.
curfew.question: Is there a curfew?

extra_costs.question: What extra costs are there besides rent?

manager_in_residence.answer: Orange House has an on-site manager, while Lemon House and Apple House do not.
manager_in_residence.question: Is there a manager in residence?

move_in_requirements.answer: Each house requires you to bring consumables and a valid ID.
move_in_requirements.question: What do I need when I move in?

rent_due_date.answer: Orange House rent is due by the 10th of each month, while Lemon House and Apple House pay on the calendar day that matches their move-in date. For example, if you move in on the 23rd, rent is due every 23rd.
rent_due_date.question: When do I need to pay the rent every month?

room_occupancy.answer: All houses accommodate up to 2 guests per room.
room_occupancy.question: Up to how many people can stay in a room?

FAQExtraCostsTable.private_washer: Each room has a private washing machine.

FAQLayout.description: Here you'll find the key information to make the most of your stay. If you don't see your question here, please contact us via the inquiry form or by phone.

meta.description: Find answers to common questions about our share houses.
meta.title: FAQ

FAQLayout.title: Frequently asked questions

apple.description: Apple House places residents within a one-minute walk of Daikokucho Station while keeping Namba in easy reach. Every private room includes a full bathroom and kitchen, delivering condo-like comfort for medium and long stays.
highlights: Private rooms with kitchen and bathroom (11 m¬≤)
Lounge with a beautiful, fully equipped kitchen

lemon.description: Lemon House offers private rooms and select dormitory options just moments from the heart of Namba. The compact building keeps an intimate feel while delivering everything needed for short and long-term stays.
highlights: Private rooms with kitchens and bathrooms (19 m¬≤)
Spacious rooms, great for couples and friends
Community life and international mingle in the center of Osaka

orange.description: Orange House is a private-room share house in retro Showach≈ç, Abeno Ward. Enjoy prime access to central Osaka and relax with international friends in our Japanese-style lounge.
highlights: Retro Japanese rooftop lounge (100 m¬≤) with Abeno Harukas views

nearby.convenience: Convenience store and post office about 3 minutes on foot
nearby.supermarkets: 24-hour supermarket right next to the guest house and another large supermarket about 1 minute away
nearby.sushi: Conveyor belt sushi restaurant about 3 minutes on foot

apple.overview: Only 1 minute walk from Daikokucho Station (Subway Midosuji Line, Yotsubashi Line). Just by a 24 hour open supermarket. Near 200 year old Kizu Market, and large public bath with hot stone spa. Walking distance from Namba, so you can enjoy the night life without worrying the last trains.

stations.daikokucho: Daikokucho Station (Subway Midosuji and Yotsubashi Lines), Exit 2 ‚Äî about 1 minute on foot
stations.ebisucho: Ebisucho Station ‚Äî about 11 minutes on foot
stations.imamiya: Imamiya Station / Imamiya-Ebisu ‚Äî about 7 minutes on foot
stations.namba: Namba Stations (various lines) ‚Äî about 15 minutes on foot

nearby.discount_shop: Discount shop about 5 minutes on foot plus additional convenience stores within walking distance
nearby.post_office: Post office about 2 minutes on foot
nearby.supermarkets: Supermarkets nearby at roughly 2, 4, and 6 minutes on foot

lemon.overview: Only 8 minutes walk to Namba! Great location, enjoy night life without worrying the last trains. Great access to anywhere in Osaka. Perfect for sightseeing or longer stay. No curfew.

stations.namba: Namba Station (Subway Midosuji Line), Exit 4 ‚Äî about 10 minutes on foot
stations.nankai_namba: Nankai Namba Station (South Exit) ‚Äî about 8 minutes on foot
stations.nihonbashi: Nihonbashi Station (Subway Sakaisuji Line), Exit 10 ‚Äî about 8 minutes on foot

nearby.harukas: Abeno Harukas 15 minutes on foot; Qs Mall 12 minutes on foot
nearby.supermarkets: Supermarkets within about 5 minutes on foot

orange.overview: Just a 15-minute walk to Abeno Harukas, the iconic 300-meter-tall skyscraper. The area is close to major city attractions and offers excellent public transportation access to destinations such as Osaka Castle, Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan, Universal Studios Japan, and Ts≈´tenkaku Tower. The nearest train stations are only a few minutes away on foot. Within walking distance, you‚Äôll also find supermarkets, convenience stores, ¬•100 shops, a fitness center, a bicycle shop, and the ward office.

stations.fuminosato: Fuminosato Station (Subway Tanimachi Line), Exit 6 ‚Äî 3 minutes on foot
stations.showacho: Showacho Station (Subway Midosuji Line), Exit 2 ‚Äî 7 minutes on foot
stations.tennoji: Tennoji / Abenobashi ‚Äî about 15 minutes on foot

highlights.apple: Walking distance to Namba and reach Daikokucho Station in just one minute.
highlights.lemon: Excellent access on the Subway Midosuji Line keeps you connected across Osaka.
highlights.orange: Excellent access on the Subway Midosuji and Tanimachi Lines keeps you connected across Osaka.

other_fees.deposit: Deposit: ¬•30,000 (returned when you leave, if no damage)
other_fees.common_fee: Management and shared fees: ¬•10,000 per month

apple.rent: ¬•50,000 ~ ¬•70,000 per month (up to 2 people per room)

short_stay.all_fees: Stays under 3 months: All fees included.

dormitory.details: Co-ed, 3 beds per room, shared bathroom and kitchen.
dormitory.rate: ¬•45,000 per month (including utilities, management, and common service fees)

other_fees.deposit: Deposit: ¬•30,000 (returned when you leave, if no damage)
other_fees.service_fee: Management and shared fees: ¬•10,000 per month

lemon.rent: ¬•50,000 ~ ¬•70,000 per month (up to 2 people per room)

intro.company: Animo Kikaku Co., Ltd. (‚Äúthe Company‚Äù, ‚Äúwe‚Äù, ‚Äúour‚Äù, or ‚Äúus‚Äù) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information.
intro.purpose: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect the information you provide through the contact forms and other features on this website (‚Äúthe Service‚Äù).

paragraphs: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Any significant changes will be announced on this page, with the updated date clearly indicated.
changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy

paragraphs: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data handling practices, please contact us at:
contact.title: 7. Contact Us

information_collected.closing: We collect this information directly from you when you submit a form or communicate with us.
list: Basic details: your name, age, gender, nationality, email address, and (optionally) telephone number
Inquiry details: message content, questions, and form submission data
Accommodation details: preferred tour dates, move-in dates, and housing preferences
paragraphs: When you contact us through the Service, we may collect the following personal information:
information_collected.title: 1. Information We Collect

paragraphs: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described above.
Generally, this means up to 10 years after your business relationship with us ends.
After this period, the information will be securely deleted or anonymized.
retention.title: 3. Retention Period

rights.closing: We will respond promptly and transparently to all legitimate requests in accordance with Japanese privacy law.
list: Request access to the personal information we hold about you
Request correction, addition, or deletion of inaccurate or outdated information
Withdraw your consent to the processing of your information (where applicable)
rights.title: 5. Your Rights

paragraphs: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, alteration, or disclosure.
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only.
security.title: 6. Security Measures

paragraphs: We do not share or sell your personal information to third parties.

Your data will not be transferred outside Japan without your consent, unless required by law or necessary to protect legal rights in accordance with the Act on the Protection of Personal Information (APPI) and other applicable regulations.
sharing.title: 4. Sharing and International Transfers

usage.closing: We do not use your information for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.
list: Responding to your inquiries or requests
Arranging property tours and managing move-in procedures
Providing information, updates, and support related to the Service
Maintaining internal records necessary for business operations and compliance
paragraphs: We use your personal information only for legitimate business purposes, including:
usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information

apple.caption: 1 minute to Daikokucho Station, and Namba is an easy walk. Relaxed international community in a cozy lounge.
apple.name: Apple House
apple.summary: Well-appointed private rooms and a luxe lounge

lemon.caption: Lemon House is an 8-minute walk from Namba. Walk to nightlife spots without worrying about the last train.
lemon.name: Lemon House
lemon.summary: Share house 8 minutes from Namba Station

orange.caption: Prime access to retro Showach≈ç. International crowd in our Japanese-style lounge.
orange.name: Orange House

room.toilet_shower_and_bathtub: All rooms have toilet, shower and bathtub.
room.washing_machine_in_balcony: There is a washing machine in the balcony.

common-spaces.apple_tv_and_satellite_channels: You can enjoy the Apple TV and satellite channels on the large TV screen.
common-spaces.toilet_with_washlet_in_lounge: Toilet with washlet in the lounge.

building-features.elevator_for_heavy_luggages: We have an elevator so you can easily bring in heavy luggages.
building-features.bicycle_parking_space: Bicycle parking space in front of the building.
building-features.view_from_rooftop_balcony: The view from the rooftop balcony

neighborhood.hour_open_supermarket: 24 hour open supermarket just by the guest house.
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_rotating_sushi_restauran: 3 minutes walk to rotating sushi restaurant (kuru kuru sushi).
neighborhood.shop_just_by_daikokucho_station: ¬•100 shop just by the Daikokucho station.
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_convenience_store: 3 minutes walk to a convenience store.
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_post_office: 3 minutes walk to a post office.

room.free_to_use_all_tablewares: You are free to use all the tablewares.
room.bathroom_with_sink_toilet_shower_and_bat: Bathroom with sink, toilet, shower, and bathtub
room.kitchen_with_dishes_cutlery_cups_and_kit: Kitchen with dishes, cutlery, cups and kitchenware, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, rice cooker

neighborhood.minute_walk_from_nihonbashi_station_exit: 8 minute walk from Nihonbashi Station Exit 8
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_post_office: 2 minutes walk to a post office
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_discount_shop: 5 minutes walk to a discount shop
neighborhood.walking_distance_to_doguyasuji: Walking distance to Doguyasuji, where you can find all sorts of cooking equipments

room.all_rooms_set_in_traditional_japanese_st: A Japanese-style room with a retro aesthetic.
room.each_room_has_water_and_gas: Each room has both water and gas. There is also a gas cooker.
room.closet_as_desk_with_lamp_bookshelf_and_o: The closet can double as a desk with a lamp, bookshelf, and multiple wall outlets.

common-spaces.tv_show_by_abc: We were on a TV show by ABC, a Japanese broadcasting station
common-spaces.lounge_equipped_with_large_air_condition: The lounge is equipped with a large air conditioner, very comfortable whether it's summer or winter. There is also a sink.
common-spaces.large_collection_of_complete_comic_sets: We have a large collection of complete manga sets for you to enjoy.
common-spaces.party_at_lounge_about_every_month: We hold a party at lounge about every month.
common-spaces.coffee_tea_and_japanese_tea_available: Coffee, tea, and Japanese tea available at the free drink section.

building-features.see_abeno_harukas_from_rooftop: You can see Abeno Harukas from the rooftop
building-features.showacho_traditional_area: Showacho is a retro area lined with Japanese-style tiled roofs.

neighborhood.supermarket_by_showacho_station: There's also a supermarket right by Showacho Station.
neighborhood.stylish_stores_behind_station: Behind the station you'll find stylish shops in restored Japanese rowhouses.
neighborhood.minutes_walk_to_biggest_shopping_mall: 12 minutes walk to one of Osaka's largest shopping malls "Q's mall"
neighborhood.hanami_cherry_blossom_festival: Enjoy cherry blossoms at Momogaike Park in spring.

facilities.shower_room_behind_curtain: Behind the noren curtain, you'll find the shower.
facilities.shower_available_hours_for_free: Shower is available 24 hours, for free
facilities.equipped_with_washlet: Equipped with washlet. Toilet seats are warm and comfortable even in the winter
